definition: hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: The specific property of atmospheric transmission at near submillimeter band is studied.
sentences.chinese: 主要研究了在近亚毫米波段的大气传输特性。

sentences.english: Silicon-based MMICs for millimeter-wave applications were also developed.
sentences.chinese: 我们同时亦发展毫米波矽基单晶积体电路。

sentences.english: The variety of the ionic transports of cellular membrane that caused by the millimeter wave was described in chapter four.
sentences.chinese: 第四章研究了毫米波对红细胞膜离子通透性的影响。

sentences.english: The tunability of millimeter wave free electron laser was observed.
sentences.chinese: 观察到了毫米波自由电子激光器的调谐特性。

sentences.english: Transmitters are key parts in microwave and millimeter-wave systems.
sentences.chinese: 发射机是微波毫米波系统必不可少的关键部分。

sentences.english: In the base station, the electrical mm-wave signal was generated by O/E conversion.
sentences.chinese: 在基站中通过光电转换器产生电毫米波。

sentences.english: The millimeter-wave machine is grayish-white and is more cylindrical.
sentences.chinese: 而毫米波扫描仪则是灰白色的，有些像圆柱形。

sentences.english: A mm-wave frequency synthesizer with small step and full-phase-coherence was developed.
sentences.chinese: 研制出一种小步进全相参毫米波频率合成源。

sentences.english: Millimeter-wave power amplifier is the key component in millimeter-wave transmitter system, and the performance affects the whole system indicators.
sentences.chinese: 毫米波功率放大器是毫米波发射系统的关键部件。

sentences.english: Millimeter-wave power amplifier is the key component in millimeter-wave transmitter system, and the performance affects the whole system indicators.
sentences.chinese: 毫米波功率放大器是毫米波发射系统的关键部件。

sentences.english: The development of millimeter wave radar system for car anti-collision in some developed countries is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了国外毫米波汽车防撞雷达系统发展的现状。

sentences.english: We have made a systematic study in optically pumped submillimeter wave laser.
sentences.chinese: 该作者曾对光泵亚毫米波激光作过系统深入地的研究。

sentences.english: The absorption and scattering of sand and dust particles can cause the attenuation in mm-wave band.
sentences.chinese: 沙尘粒子的吸收和散射效应能引起毫米波信号的衰减。

sentences.english: Millimeter-wave dielectric lens antenna is a kind of aperture antenna with high directivity.
sentences.chinese: 毫米波介质透镜天线是一种高方向性的口径天线。

sentences.english: The design of MMW H-plane Y-junction waveguide circulator is given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文给出毫米波H面波导Y结环行器的设计。

sentences.english: Conclusion Physiatrics for patients in the department of otorhinolaryngology by millimeter microwave is effective.
sentences.chinese: 结论毫米波疗法治疗耳鼻喉科疾病具有良好的疗效。
